analysis.description: WCToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/34/0x1dc9edfa2a929ee0c59159bae3769591ec563f1c.sol#321-328) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/34/0x1dc9edfa2a929ee0c59159bae3769591ec563f1c.sol:
	Contract WCToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/34/0x1dc9edfa2a929ee0c59159bae3769591ec563f1c.sol#165)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

WCToken.claimToken (/unique_chucks/34/0x1dc9edfa2a929ee0c59159bae3769591ec563f1c.sol#298-301) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/34/0x1dc9edfa2a929ee0c59159bae3769591ec563f1c.sol#300)

WCToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/34/0x1dc9edfa2a929ee0c59159bae3769591ec563f1c.sol#321-328)
	- /unique_chucks/34/0x1dc9edfa2a929ee0c59159bae3769591ec563f1c.sol#326-327
